GSD.description:
f2fs: set SBI_NEED_FSCK flag when inconsistent node block found

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.83 by commit 22423c966e02175a45bc010134d734e920b76cdf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: f2fs: set SBI_NEED_FSCK flag when inconsistent node block found
